Package org.melior.client.ldap

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection
    Implements a wrapper around an LDAP Connection delegate.
    ConnectionFactory
    Implements a factory for persistent LDAP Connection objects.
    ConnectionManager
    Implements a manager for persistent LDAP Connection objects, for connections to LDAP servers.
    LdapClient
    Implements an easy to use, auto-configuring LDAP client with connection pooling, configurable backoff strategy and automatic object mapping.
    LdapClientBuilder
    Convenience class for building an LdapClient.
    LdapClientConfig
    Configuration parameters for a LdapClient, with defaults.
    LdapObjectMapper<T>
    For the LDAP search use case, takes the attributes from an LDAP SearchResult and maps the attributes to the members of a new instance of the specified type.
    LdapSocketFactory
    Implements a factory for secure LDAP sockets.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    LdapProperty
    Indicates that the target represents an LDAP attribute within LDAP search results.
